issue.title: Bad management of multiple attributes inside a metadata
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

When defining attribute having multiple occurrences inside metadata, playing with it (adding/removing occurrences) leads to obtain inconsistent formulary.
User loose control of managing such occurrences as minus button disapears for some of them.
(see copy screen in attachment)

It happens in frontend and backend metadata edition formularies.

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0
